official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the awarding of a special gold medal to Fred Waring.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of the Congress, a gold medal to Fred Waring, Louis L'Amour and the widow of Joe Louis. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell bronze duplicates of each medal. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the awarding of a special gold medal to Fred Waring.
